original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Meṇḍakapañha
analyzed: meṇḍakapañha

original: Santhavavagga
analyzed: santhava vagga

original: 5. Buddhaaviheṭhakapañha
analyzed: buddha a viheṭhaka pañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena bhāsitam petam bhagavatā

original: ‘pubbe vāhaṁ manussabhūto samāno sattānaṁ aviheṭhakajātiko ahosin’ti.
analyzed: pubbe vā aham manussa bhūtaḥ samānaḥ sattānam a viheṭhaka jātikaḥ ahosin ti

original: Puna ca bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: punar ca bhaṇita

original: ‘lomasakassapo nāma isi samāno anekasate pāṇe ghātayitvā vājapeyyaṁ mahāyaññaṁ yajī’ti.
analyzed: lomasakassapaḥ nāma isi samānaḥ aneka sate pāṇe ghātayitvā vājapeyyam mahāyaññam yaji iti

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, bhagavatā bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena bhagavatā bhaṇita

original: ‘pubbe vāhaṁ manussabhūto samāno sattānaṁ aviheṭhakajātiko ahosin’ti, tena hi ‘lomasakassapena
analyzed: pubbe vā aham manussa bhūtaḥ samānaḥ sattānam a viheṭhaka jātikaḥ ahosin ti tena hi lomasakassapena

original: isinā anekasate pāṇe ghātayitvā vājapeyyaṁ mahāyaññaṁ yajitan’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
analyzed: isinā aneka sate pāṇe ghātayitvā vājapeyyam mahā yaññam yam tam micchā

original: Yadi ‘lomasakassapena isinā anekasate pāṇe ghātayitvā vājapeyyaṁ mahāyaññaṁ yajitaṁ’,
analyzed: yadi lomasakassapena isinā aneka sate pāṇe ghātayitvā vājapeyyam mahā yaññam yajita

original: tena hi ‘pubbe vāhaṁ manussabhūto samāno sattānaṁ aviheṭhakajātiko ahosin’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
analyzed: tena hi pubbe vā aham manussa bhūtaḥ samānaḥ sattānam a viheṭhaka jātikaḥ ahosin ti tat pi vacanam micchā

original: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
analyzed: ayam pi ubhatas koṭikaḥ pañho tava anuppatto saḥ tayā nibbāhitabbaḥ ti

original: “Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā—
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā

original: ‘pubbe vāhaṁ manussabhūto samāno sattānaṁ aviheṭhakajātiko ahosin’ti, ‘lomasakassapena
analyzed: pubbe vā aham manussa bhūtaḥ samānaḥ sattānam a viheṭhaka jātikaḥ ahosinti lomasakassapena

original: isinā anekasate pāṇe ghātayitvā vājapeyyaṁ mahāyaññaṁ yajitaṁ’, tañca pana rāgavasena
analyzed: isinā aneka sate pāṇe ghātayitvā vājapeyyam mahā yaññam yajita tat ca pana rāga vasena

original: visaññinā, no sacetanenā”ti.
analyzed: visaññinā no sa cetanena ati

original: “Aṭṭhime, bhante nāgasena, puggalā pāṇaṁ hananti.
analyzed: aṭṭhime bhante nāgasena puggalā pāṇam hananti

original: Katame aṭṭha?
analyzed: katame aṭṭha

original: Ratto rāgavasena pāṇaṁ hanati, duṭṭho dosavasena pāṇaṁ hanati, mūḷho mohavasena pāṇaṁ
analyzed: rattaḥ rāga vasena pāṇam hanati duṭṭhaḥ dosa vasena pāṇam hanati mūḷhaḥ moha vasena pāṇa

original: hanati, mānī mānavasena pāṇaṁ hanati, luddho lobhavasena pāṇaṁ hanati, akiñcano jīvikatthāya
analyzed: hanati mānī māna vasena pāṇam hanati luddhaḥ lobha vasena pāṇam hanati akiñcanaḥ jīvikatthāya

original: pāṇaṁ hanati, bālo hassavasena pāṇaṁ hanati, rājā vinayanavasena pāṇaṁ hanati.
analyzed: pāṇam hanati bālaḥ hassa vasena pāṇam hanati rājā vinayana vasena pāṇam hanati

original: Ime kho, bhante nāgasena, aṭṭha puggalā pāṇaṁ hananti.
analyzed: ime kho bhante nāgasena aṭṭha puggalā pāṇam hananti

original: Pākatikaṁyeva, bhante nāgasena, bodhisattena katan”ti.
analyzed: pākatikayā iva bhante nāgasena bodhisattena katanti

original: “Na, mahārāja, pākatikaṁ bodhisattena kataṁ, yadi, mahārāja, bodhisatto pakatibhāvena onameyya mahāyaññaṁ yajituṁ, na yimaṁ gāthaṁ bhaṇeyya—
analyzed: na mahā rāja pākatikam bodhisattena yadi mahā rāja bodhisatto pakati bhāvena onameyya mahā yaññam na gātham bhaṇeyya

original: ‘Sasamuddapariyāyaṁ,
analyzed: sa samudda pariyāya

original: mahiṁ sāgarakuṇḍalaṁ;
analyzed: mahim sāgara kuṇḍala

original: Na icche saha nindāya,
analyzed: na icche saha nindāya

original: evaṁ seyha vijānahī’ti.
analyzed: evam seyha vijānahi iti

original: Evaṁvādī, mahārāja, bodhisatto saha dassanena candavatiyā rājakaññāya visaññī ahosi
analyzed: eva vādī mahā rāja bodhisatto saha dassanena candavatiyāḥ rāja kaññāya visaññī ahosi

original: khittacitto ratto visaññibhūto ākulākulo turitaturito tena vikkhittabhantaluḷitacittena
analyzed: khitta cittaḥ rattaḥ visaññi bhūtaḥ ākula ākulaḥ turita turitaḥ tena vikkhitta bhanta luḷita cittena

original: mahatimahāpasughātagalaruhirasañcayaṁ vājapeyyaṁ mahāyaññaṁ yaji.
analyzed: vājapeyyam mahāyaññam yaji

original: Yathā, mahārāja, ummattako khittacitto jalitampi jātavedaṁ akkamati, kupitampi āsīvisaṁ
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja ummattakaḥ khitta cittaḥ jalitam pi jātavedam akkamati kupitam pi

original: gaṇhāti, mattampi hatthiṁ upeti, samuddampi atīradassiṁ pakkhandati, candanikampi
analyzed: gaṇhāti mattam pi hatthim upeti samuddam pi a tīra dassim pakkhandati candanikam pi

original: oḷigallampi omaddati, kaṇṭakādhānampi abhiruhati, papātepi patati, asucimpi bhakkheti,
analyzed: oḷigallampi omaddati kaṇṭakādhānampi abhiruhati papāte pi patati asucimpi bhakkheti

original: naggopi rathiyā carati, aññampi bahuvidhaṁ akiriyaṁ karoti.
analyzed: naggaḥ upi rathiyā carati aññam pi bahuvidham a kiriyam karoti

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, bodhisatto saha dassanena candavatiyā rājakaññāya visaññī
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja bodhisatto saha dassanena candavatiyāḥ rāja kaññāya visaññī

original: ahosi khittacitto ratto visaññibhūto ākulākulo turitaturito, tena vikkhittabhantaluḷitacittena
analyzed: ahosi khitta cittaḥ rattaḥ visaññi bhūtaḥ ākula ākulaḥ turita turitaḥ tena vikkhitta bhanta luḷita cittena

original: mahatimahāpasughātagalaruhirasañcayaṁ vājapeyyaṁ mahāyaññaṁ yaji.
analyzed: vājapeyyam mahāyaññam yaji

original: Khittacittena, mahārāja, kataṁ pāpaṁ diṭṭhadhammepi na mahāsāvajjaṁ hoti, samparāye vipākenapi no tathā.
analyzed: khitta cittena mahā rāja katam pāpam diṭṭhadhamme pi na mahā sāvajjam hoti samparāye vipākena api no tathā

original: Idha, mahārāja, koci ummattako vajjhamāpajjeyya, tassa tumhe kiṁ daṇḍaṁ dhārethā”ti?
analyzed: idha mahā rāja koci ummattakaḥ vajjham āpajjeyya tassa tumhe kim daṇḍam dhāretha ati

original: “Ko, bhante, ummattakassa daṇḍo bhavissati, taṁ mayaṁ pothāpetvā nīharāpema, esova tassa daṇḍo”ti.
analyzed: kaḥ bhante ummattakassa daṇḍaḥ bhavissati tam mayam pothāpetvā nīharāpema esaḥ uva tassa daṇḍaḥ ti

original: “Iti kho, mahārāja, ummattakassa aparādhe daṇḍopi na bhavati, tasmā ummattakassa katepi na doso bhavati satekiccho.
analyzed: iti kho mahā rāja ummattakassa aparādhe daṇḍaḥ api na bhavati tasmai ummattakassa kate pi na dosaḥ bhavati sa tekicchaḥ

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, lomasakassapo isi saha dassanena candavatiyā rājakaññāya visaññī
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja lomasakassapaḥ isi saha dassanena candavatiyāḥ rāja kaññāya visaññī

original: ahosi khittacitto ratto visaññibhūto visaṭapayāto ākulākulo turitaturito, tena vikkhittabhantaluḷitacittena
analyzed: ahosi khitta cittaḥ rattaḥ visaññi bhūtaḥ visaṭa payāto ākula ākulaḥ turita turitaḥ tena vikkhitta bhanta luḷita cittena

original: mahatimahāpasughātagalaruhirasañcayaṁ vājapeyyaṁ mahāyaññaṁ yaji.
analyzed: vājapeyyam mahāyaññam yaji

original: Yadā ca pana pakaticitto ahosi paṭiladdhassati, tadā punadeva pabbajitvā pañcābhiññāyo nibbattetvā brahmalokūpago ahosī”ti.
analyzed: yadā ca pana pakaticittaḥ ahosi paṭiladdhaḥ sati tadā punadeva pabbajitvā pañca abhiññāyaḥ nibbattetvā brahma loka upagaḥ ahosi iti

original: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Buddhaaviheṭhakapañho pañcamo.
analyzed: buddha aviheṭhaka pañhaḥ pañcamo
